issue.title: Improve Config CLI

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

issue.body:
Fixes #41131

- Properly add help flags
- Moved required options to parameters
- Add a `remove` command

rename.from: Picocli - Some expected errors lead to a stacktrace and they shouldn't
rename.to: Quarkus CLI - Some expected errors lead to a stacktrace and they shouldn't

body: This is not a problem with the Picocli extension but specific to the Quarkus CLI. PR in the works...

issue.title: Catch exceptions when running checkMissingCommand

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

issue.body:
We want to check for the missing commands only, any other error will have to be handled by Picocli later (and thus will properly handle the formatting of the feedback and avoid a stacktrace).

Fixes #41513
